attributes.action: A system of checking workplaces for discrimination in London.
attributes.additional_details: It is unacceptable for humans to go through such a thing as it leads to financial instability and therefore worse issues such as crime and poverty. It is a violation of human rights!
attributes.background: Hold a meeting/discuss ways to prevent discrimination in the workplace.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about discrimination, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Discriminating against someone because of a protected characteristic is already against the law. You can find out more about discrimination law here: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/law-and-courts/discrimination/taking-action-about-discrimination/taking-legal-action-about-discrimination/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
